name: @apps/hash-graph
description: The entity-graph query-layer for the HASH datastore

scripts.build:docker: docker buildx build --build-arg PROFILE=production --build-arg ENABLE_TEST_SERVER=yes --tag hash-graph --file docker/Dockerfile ../../ --load
scripts.build:docker:dev: docker buildx build --build-arg PROFILE=dev --build-arg ENABLE_TEST_SERVER=yes --tag hash-graph --file docker/Dockerfile ../../ --load
scripts.doc:dependency-diagram: cargo run -p hash-repo-chores -- dependency-diagram --output docs/dependency-diagram.mmd --root hash-graph --root-deps-and-dependents --link-mode non-roots --include-dev-deps --include-build-deps --logging-console-level info
